title: WTB: T3 Rube Waddell card Turkey Red
author: JJ McGraw

posts.post_title: WTB: T3 Rube Waddell card Turkey Red
posts.post_content:
I’m looking for a presentable, but not pristine, not one of a kind or “special” T3 card of Rube Waddell( see below), but one that will display well.
Again, just needs to present well and not be taped together , pieces missing etc, just a decent solid card. Thanks in advance.
